&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: justify; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company is in the process of evaluating the impact on its consolidated financial statements upon adoption.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: justify; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;


&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;4.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;DISPOSAL OF SUBSIDIARIES&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;In June 2014
 the Company sold its wholly owned subsidiary in the powdered formula segment
 Zhangjiakou Chahaer Dairy Co.
 Ltd. (Zhangjiakou) to Rightcom Co.
 Ltd. (the Purchaser) for a total cash consideration of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;28.1&lt;/font&gt; million to be paid in&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;three&lt;/font&gt; installments. As of June 30
 2014
 the Company has completed all of the closing procedures with the exception of the re-registration of land use right certificates and has effectively transferred its control on Zhangjiakou to the Purchaser. The Company considers the re-registration of land use right certificate with the relevant government bureaus to be administrative in nature. As the result of the sale
 the Company recorded a $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;15.0&lt;/font&gt; million in gain ($&lt;font class=_mt&gt;11.9&lt;/font&gt; million after tax)
 which was calculated as the total of the excess of the sale proceeds over the net book value of the assets transferred of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;20.1&lt;/font&gt; million and reclassification of foreign currency translation gain of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;7.0&lt;/font&gt; million from Other Comprehensive Income. The Purchaser made a &lt;font class=_mt&gt;20&lt;/font&gt;% payment of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;5.6&lt;/font&gt; million and a &lt;font class=_mt&gt;60&lt;/font&gt;% payment of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;16.9&lt;/font&gt; million in May and July 2014 respectively. Along with the completion of the re-registration of land use right certificates
 the Company collected the remaining &lt;font class=_mt&gt;20&lt;/font&gt;% payment of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;5.6&lt;/font&gt; million in May 2015.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Prior to the sale
 the Company used Zhangjiakou to process high oil whey power to use in its production of powered formula products. Concurrently with the disposal
 the Company has entered into agreements with Zhangjiakou
 under which the Company will continue to engage Zhangjiakou in processing at least&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;16
000&lt;/font&gt; tons of whey powder for the Company over the next two years.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;In July 2014
 the Company entered into a share purchase agreement with Beijing Jinkangpu Food Technology Co.
 Ltd. (Jinkangpu) to dispose its wholly owned subsidiary in the food segment
 Beijing Huiliduo Food Technology Co.
 Ltd. (Beijing Huiliduo) for a total cash consideration of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;1.3&lt;/font&gt; million to be paid in&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;two&lt;/font&gt; installments. As of September 30
 2014
 the Company has completed all of the closing procedures and has effectively transferred its control on Beijing Huiliduo to Jinkangpu. As the result of the sale
 the Company recorded a $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;0.3&lt;/font&gt; million in gain
 which was calculated as the total of the excess of the sale proceeds over the net book value of the assets transferred of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;1.0&lt;/font&gt; million. Jinkangpu made a &lt;font class=_mt&gt;19&lt;/font&gt;% payment in fiscal year 2015

  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;D.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Cash and cash equivalents&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Cash and cash equivalents consist of cash on hand and highly liquid investments which are unrestricted as to withdrawal or use




&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;17.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;COMMITMENTS AND CONTINGENCIES&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;A.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Purchase commitments&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;As of March 31
 2015
 the Company had outstanding commitments of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;494
000&lt;/font&gt; for advertising purchases
 and $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;30.0&lt;/font&gt; million for milk powder and whey powder within the next twelve months. According to the French Project's contracts with Sodiaal and Euroserum
 the Company committed to purchase
 and Sodiaal and Euroserum committed to sell
&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;288&lt;/font&gt; million liters of milk per year for&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;ten&lt;/font&gt; years. This committed an amount of whey equivalent to&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;24
000&lt;/font&gt; tons of &lt;font class=_mt&gt;70&lt;/font&gt;% demineralized pre-concentrated dry whey extract per year for&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;ten&lt;/font&gt; years
 and&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;6
000&lt;/font&gt; tons of &lt;font class=_mt&gt;70&lt;/font&gt;% demineralized whey powder per year
 or an equivalent quantity of liquid whey
 for&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;ten&lt;/font&gt; years
 at market based prices at the time of purchase
 to satisfy the production needs of the new drying facility. As the price of raw milk and whey for the next ten year cannot be predicted with precision
 the commitment amount above excludes the raw milk and whey purchase commitment of the French Project.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;B.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Capital expenditure commitments&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;As of March 31
 2015
 the Company's capital expenditure commitments of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;82.8&lt;/font&gt; million are mainly related to signed contracts for construction and manufacturing equipment for the French Project.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;C.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Operating lease commitments&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company's operating leases mainly included lease of two land use rights for 13 years and 33 years
 respectively
 under non-cancellable operating lease
 as well as office facilities and warehouses under non-cancellable operating leases. The operating lease commitments of the Company at March 31
 2015 are as follows:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;

&lt;p style=text-align: center; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;March 31&lt;/b&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/td&gt;

&lt;td style=width: 16px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;

 2015 and 2014 was comprised entirely of foreign currency translation adjustments. During fiscal year 2015
 the Company 1) disposed Zhangjiakou and reclassified net currency translation adjustments totaling $7.0 million from accumulated other comprehensive income to net income; 2) disposed Beijing Huiliduo with&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;no&lt;/font&gt; reclassification of currency translation adjustments. During fiscal year 2014
 the Company disposed of&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;one&lt;/font&gt; immaterial subsidiary
 with&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;no&lt;/font&gt; reclassification of currency translation adjustments. During fiscal year 2013

&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Comprehensive income (loss)&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Comprehensive income (loss) is defined to include all changes in equity of the Company during a period from transactions and other events and circumstances except those resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners


&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt; &lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div&gt;

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: center; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;FINANCIAL INFORMATION OF PARENT COMPANY &lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: center; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;STATEMENTS OF CASH FLOWS&lt;/b&gt; &lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 2.5pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note to Schedule I&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; border-collapse: collapse; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 61px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;1.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 14px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1486px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Schedule I has been provided pursuant to the requirements of Rule 12-04(a) and 5-04(c) of Regulation S-X
 which require condensed financial information as to the financial position
 changes in financial position and results of operations of a parent company as of the same dates and for the same periods for which audited consolidated financial statements have been presented when the restricted net assets of consolidated subsidiaries exceed 25 percent of consolidated net assets as of the end of the most recently completed fiscal year.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; border-collapse: collapse; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 61px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;2.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 14px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1486px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The condensed financial information of Synutra International Inc. has been prepared using the same accounting policies as set out in the accompanying consolidated financial statements except that the equity method has been used to account for investments in its subsidiaries.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; border-collapse: collapse; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 61px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;3.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 14px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1486px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Certain information and footnote disclosures normally included in financial statements prepared in accordance with U.S. GAAP have been condensed or omitted. The footnote disclosures contain supplemental information relating to the operations of the Company and
 as such
 these statements should be read in conjunction with the notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; border-collapse: collapse; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 61px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;4.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 14px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1486px; text-align: justify; padding-right: 0.8pt;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;As of March 31
 2015
 there were no material contingencies
 significant provisions of long-term obligations
 mandatory dividend or redemption requirements of redeemable stocks or guarantees of the Company
 except for those which have been separately disclosed in the Consolidated Financial Statement


&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;B.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Basis of consolidation&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The consolidated financial statements include the financial statements of Synutra International
 Inc. and its subsidiaries
 its consolidated variable interest entity
 Beijing Shengyuan Huimin Technology Service Co.
 Ltd. (the variable interest entity
 or VIE)
 in which it has a controlling financial interest. A controlling financial interest is typically determined when a company holds a majority of the voting equity interest in an entity. US GAAP provides guidance on the identification and financial reporting for entities over which control is achieved through means other than voting interests
 which requires certain VIEs to be consolidated by the primary beneficiary of the entity if the equity investors in the entity do not have the characteristics of a controlling financial interest or do not have sufficient equity at risk for the entity to finance its activities without additional subordinated financial support from other parties.&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;Through the contractual arrangements between the Company and the VIE
 the Company controls the operating activities and holds all the beneficial interests of the VIE and has been determined to be the primary beneficiary of the VIE. The Company has concluded that such contractual arrangements are legally enforceable. The operations associated with the consolidated VIE are insignificant and the consolidated VIE holds de minimis assets and liabilities.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;As of March 31
 2015
 the maturity dates of the short-term debt outstanding range from&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;June 2015&lt;/font&gt; to &lt;font class=_mt&gt;March 2016&lt;/font&gt;. The weighted average interest rate on short-term debt outstanding at March 31
 2015 and 2014 was &lt;font class=_mt&gt;2.6&lt;/font&gt;% and &lt;font class=_mt&gt;4.9&lt;/font&gt;%
 respectively. Certain portion of these debts use floating interest rates
 which are calculated based on the benchmark lending interest rate published by China's central bank or on LIBOR. are &amp;#128;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;20.0&lt;/font&gt; million (equivalent to $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;21.7&lt;/font&gt; million).&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Long-term debt&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The long-term debts
 including current portion
 as of March 31
 2015 and 2014 are comprised of:&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;As of March 31
 2015
 among the long-term debts which were borrowed in Mainland China
 $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;11.9&lt;/font&gt; million was secured by restricted cash deposits of $&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;14.3&lt;/font&gt; million and the rest $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;142.5&lt;/font&gt; million were credit debts. These debts used floating interest rates
 which are calculated based on the benchmark lending interest rate published by China's central bank
 or LIBOR. The maturity dates range from&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;June 2015&lt;/font&gt; to &lt;font class=_mt&gt;February 2018&lt;/font&gt;. A long-term loan of &amp;#128;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;11.0&lt;/font&gt; million (equivalent to $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;11.9&lt;/font&gt; million) which will due in&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;February 2018&lt;/font&gt; is restricted to the purpose of construction of the French project as of March 31
 2015.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;As of &lt;font class=_mt&gt;March 31
 2015&lt;/font&gt;
 the long-term debts which were borrowed in Hong Kong were secured by restricted cash deposit of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;75.6&lt;/font&gt; million. These debts used floating interest rates
 which are calculated based on LIBOR. The maturity dates of the used facility range from&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;May 2015&lt;/font&gt; to &lt;font class=_mt&gt;November 2016&lt;/font&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;As of March 31
 2015
 the long-term debts which were borrowed in France were secured by restricted cash deposit of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;37.4&lt;/font&gt; million. These debts used floating interest rates
 which are calculated based on LIBOR. The maturity dates of the borrowed debts range from&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;January 2019&lt;/font&gt; to &lt;font class=_mt&gt;February 2019&lt;/font&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;As of March 31
 2015
 the Company had unused committed long-term loan facility for Synutra France of &amp;#128;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;53.0&lt;/font&gt; million (equivalent to $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;57.5&lt;/font&gt; million) from a bank. This facility used floating interest rate
 which was calculated based on LIBOR. The term of this facility was&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;eight&lt;/font&gt; years
 commencing from the actual drawdown date. This facility was pledged by all the long-lived assets of Synutra France. The Company had begun to use the facility in April 2015.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The weighted average interest rate as of March 31
 2015 and 2014 for the long-term debts was &lt;font class=_mt&gt;4.4&lt;/font&gt;% and &lt;font class=_mt&gt;4.6&lt;/font&gt;%
 respectively.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Borrowings denominated in RMB
 USD and EUR were $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;171.8&lt;/font&gt; million
 $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;187.7&lt;/font&gt; million and $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;61.2&lt;/font&gt; million as of March 31
 2015
 respectively.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Maturities on long-term debt
 including current and non-current portion
 subject to mandatory redemption are as follows:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt; &lt;/p&gt;

 the Company used the following weighted average common stocks outstanding:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.25in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;3.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;FAIR VALUE MEASUREMENTS&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The following table sets forth by level
 within the fair value hierarchy
 the Company's assets and liabilities accounted for at fair value on a nonrecurring basis as of March 31
 2015 and 2014. The Company did not have any items recorded at fair value on a recurring basis subsequent to initial recognition as of March 31
 2015 and 2014. All these items related to the nutritional food segment.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: right;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;

&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;$&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;3
605&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: right;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: right;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: right;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: right;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: right;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;

&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;$&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;

040&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;In fiscal year 2015
 there was an other-than-temporary impairment of $4.7 million charged against the prepared food equipment assets of Inner Mongolia Huiliduo Food Co.
 Ltd. (Huiliduo)
 $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;0.3&lt;/font&gt; million related to Huiliduo brand and $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;0.8&lt;/font&gt; million related to the Ausmeadow brand. The impairment loss of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;1.0&lt;/font&gt; million in fiscal year 2014 was related to the prepared food equipment assets. The Company has categorized these impairments as a level 3 fair value measurement. See Note 14


&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt; &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: center; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt; &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: center; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt; &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;X.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Fair value measurement&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;Fair value is the price that would be received to sell an asset or paid to transfer a liability in an orderly transaction between market participants at the measurement date. When determining the fair value measurements for assets and liabilities required or permitted to be recorded at fair value
 the Company considers the principal or most advantageous market in which it would transact and it considers assumptions that market participants would use when pricing the asset or liability. The fair value measurement guidance provides a fair value hierarchy that requires an entity to maximize the use of observable inputs and minimize the use of unobservable inputs when measuring fair value. A financial instrument's categorization within the fair value hierarchy is based upon the lowest level of input that is significant to the fair value measurement as follows:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Level 1 inputs are unadjusted quoted prices in active markets for identical assets that the management has the ability to access at the measurement date.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Level 2 inputs include quoted prices for similar assets in active markets
 quoted prices for identical or similar assets in markets that are not active
 inputs other than quoted prices that are observable for the asset (i.e.
 interest rates
 yield curves
 etc.)
 and inputs that are derived principally from or corroborated by observable market data by correlation or other means (market corroborated inputs).&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Level 3 inputs include unobservable inputs to the valuation methodology that reflect management's assumptions about the assumptions that market participants would use in pricing the asset. The management develops these inputs based on the best information available


&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Y.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Financial Instruments&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The carrying value of financial instruments including cash and cash equivalents
 restricted cash
 accounts receivable
 other current assets
 other assets
 accounts payable
 short-term debt
 long-term debt due within one year
 other current liabilities and due to and from related parties
 approximates their fair value at March 31
 2015 due to the relatively short-term nature of these instruments. The carrying value of long-term debt

  
  
  
  
  

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;N.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Foreign currency translation&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The functional currency and reporting currency of Synutra International
 Inc. and Synutra Illinois are United States Dollar (US Dollar).&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The financial records of the Company's PRC subsidiaries are maintained in Renminbi (RMB)
 and the financial records of the Company's Netherland and French subsidiaries are maintained in Euro (EUR)
 which are their functional currencies. Assets and liabilities are translated at the exchange rates at the balance sheet date
 equity accounts are translated at historical exchange rates and revenues
 expenses
 gains and losses are translated using the average rate for the year. Translation adjustments are reported as cumulative translation adjustments and are shown as a separate component of the consolidated statements of comprehensive income (loss).&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Monetary assets and liabilities denominated in currencies other than the functional currencies are translated into functional currencies at the rates of exchange ruling at the balance sheet date. Transactions in currencies other than the functional currencies during the year are converted into the functional currencies at the applicable rates of exchange prevailing on the day transactions occurred. Transaction gains and losses are recognized in the statement of operations. Transaction gains were $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;3.2&lt;/font&gt; million
 $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;1.9&lt;/font&gt; million and $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;0.8&lt;/font&gt; million for the year ended March 31
 2015
 2014 and 2013
 respectively and are recorded in other income (expense)

  
  
  
  
  
  

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt; &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt; &lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;L.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Impairment of indefinite lived intangible assets&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Intangible assets with an indefinite life are tested for impairment on an annual basis or when current facts or circumstances indicate that a potential impairment may exist. The impairment test consists of a comparison of the fair value of the intangible asset to its carrying amount. If the carrying amount exceeds the fair value
 an impairment loss is recognized equal in amount to that excess.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Management performs its annual impairment test for intangible assets with indefinite life on March 31. In fiscal year ended March 31
 2015
 $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;1.1&lt;/font&gt; million impairment loss was recorded for intangible assets. In fiscal year ended March 31
 2014 and 2013
&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;no&lt;/font&gt; intangible assets were impaired. See Note 14

  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;K.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Impairment of long-lived assets&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company evaluates its long-lived assets for impairment whenever events or changes in circumstances indicate that the carrying amount of an asset may not be recoverable. When these events occur
 the Company measures impairment by comparing the carrying amount of the assets to future undiscounted net cash flows expected to result from the use of the assets and their eventual disposition. If the sum of the expected undiscounted cash flow is less than the carrying amount of the assets
 the Company would recognize an impairment loss based on the fair value of the assets.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company recorded impairment charges on its property
 plant and equipment of $4.7 million
 $1.0 million and&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;nil&lt;/font&gt; for the fiscal years ended March 31
 2015
 2014 and 2013
 respectively. See Note 14

  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;15.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;INCOME TAXES&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;A.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Tax law of each tax jurisdiction&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;&lt;i&gt;United States&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Under the federal and state income tax laws of United States
 the Company is subject to tax on its income or capital gains. The applicable rate is &lt;font class=_mt&gt;34&lt;/font&gt;% for fiscal year 2015
 2014 and 2013.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;&lt;i&gt;Netherlands&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company's subsidiary incorporated in the Netherlands is subject to Netherland's profit tax. The applicable rate is &lt;font class=_mt&gt;20&lt;/font&gt;% on the first EUR&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;200
000&lt;/font&gt; of taxable profits
 and &lt;font class=_mt&gt;25&lt;/font&gt;% for taxable profits exceeding EUR 200
000 for fiscal year 2015
 2014 and 2013.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;&lt;i&gt;France&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company's subsidiary in France is subject to profit tax at&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;33&lt;/font&gt; 1/3% on assessable income.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;&lt;i&gt;Hong Kong&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company's subsidiary in Hong Kong is subject to profit tax at &lt;font class=_mt&gt;16.5&lt;/font&gt;% on assessable income.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;&lt;i&gt;China&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;On March 16
 2007
 the National People's Congress of the PRC approved and promulgated the new Enterprise Income Tax Law (EIT Law)
 which took effect beginning January 1
 2008. Under the new EIT law
 foreign investment enterprises and domestic companies are subject to a uniform tax rate of &lt;font class=_mt&gt;25&lt;/font&gt;%. The new tax law provides a transition period from its effective date for certain qualifying enterprises which were established before the promulgation date of the new tax law and which were entitled to certain preferential lower tax rate or tax holiday under the then effective tax laws or regulations.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Some of the Company's PRC subsidiaries are eligible under the transition rules to continue enjoying tax holidays or reduced tax rate until expiration. The following table illustrates the applicable tax rate and tax holidays of major PRC subsidiaries under the new EIT Law:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: bottom;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 690px; border-bottom: black 1.5pt solid;&gt;

&lt;p style=text-align: center; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 16px; padding-bottom: 1.35pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;

 2008&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 15px; padding-bottom: 1.35pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;

&lt;p style=text-align: center; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Tax Holiday (based on calendar year)&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=text-align: center; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(213,234,234);&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Shengyuan Nutritional Food Co.
 Ltd.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: center;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;25%&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;No tax holiday&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: white;&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Inner Mongolia Huiliduo Food Co.
 Ltd.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
