&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;12.5&lt;/font&gt;% (2012)&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(213,234,234);&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Inner Mongolia Mengyuan Food Co.
 Ltd.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: center;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;25%&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;No tax holiday&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: white;&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Meitek Technology (Qingdao) Co.
 Ltd.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: center;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;25%&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;12.5&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/font&gt;% (2012); high-tech enterprise at &lt;font class=_mt&gt;15&lt;/font&gt;% (2014
 2015)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(213,234,234);&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Beijing Shengyuan Huimin Technology Service Co.
 Ltd.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: center;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;25%&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;No tax holiday&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: white;&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Beijing Syclin Clinical Laboratory Co.
 Ltd.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: center;&gt;25%&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;No tax holiday&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(213,234,234);&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Global Food Trading (Shanghai) Co.
 Ltd.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: center;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;25%&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;No tax holiday&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: white;&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Shanghai Precious Care Cosmetic Co.
 Ltd.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: center;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;25%&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;No tax holiday&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;In accordance with the EIT Law
 dividends which arise from profits of foreign invested enterprises (FIEs) earned after January 1
 2008 are subject to a &lt;font class=_mt&gt;10&lt;/font&gt;% withholding tax. In addition
 under the tax arrangement between the PRC and Hong Kong
 if the foreign investor is incorporated in Hong Kong and qualifies as the beneficial owner
 the applicable withholding tax rate is reduced from &lt;font class=_mt&gt;10&lt;/font&gt;% to &lt;font class=_mt&gt;5&lt;/font&gt;%
 if the investor holds at least &lt;font class=_mt&gt;25&lt;/font&gt;% in the FIE. A deferred tax liability should be recognized for the undistributed profits of PRC companies unless the Company has sufficient evidence to demonstrate that the undistributed dividends will be indefinitely reinvested. As of March 31
 2015
 all earnings generated in countries/areas other than United States are intended to be indefinitely reinvested and as a result
 the Company did not record any deferred tax liability on such undistributed earnings.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt; &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt; &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;B.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Components of income (loss) before income tax expense (benefit)&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;For financial reporting purposes
 income (loss) before income tax expense (benefit) includes the following components:&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Reconciliation from the statutory income tax rate to reported amount of income tax expense (benefit)&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

 2014 and 2013:&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Meitek Technology (Qingdao) Co.
 Ltd. enjoys a preferential tax rate of &lt;font class=_mt&gt;15&lt;/font&gt;%
 PRC tax holiday
 which may be extended if the requirements of High and New Technology Enterprise are satisfied. The impact of this PRC tax holiday decreased income taxes by $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;0.8&lt;/font&gt; million
 nil and nil for the fiscal years ended March 31
 2015
 2014 and 2013
 respectively. The benefit of the PRC tax holidays on basic and diluted earnings (loss) per share was $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;0.01&lt;/font&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;nil&lt;/font&gt; and&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;nil&lt;/font&gt; for fiscal year 2015
 2014 and 2013
 respectively.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;D.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Deferred tax assets by type of temporary difference
 credits and change in valuation allowance&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Deferred income taxes reflect the net tax effects of temporary differences between the carrying amounts of assets and liabilities for financial reporting purposes and the amounts used for income tax purposes. Significant components of the Company's net deferred tax assets are as follows:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 1.5pt solid; text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;(26&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 1.5pt solid; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: bottom; background-color: white;&gt;&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 2.7pt; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Balance at end of year&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 2.7pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;$&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;9
048&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 2.7pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;$&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;38
604&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company uses the asset and liability method to record related deferred tax assets and liabilities. The Company considers positive and negative evidence to determine whether some portion or all of the deferred tax assets will more likely than not be realized. This assessment considers
 among other matters
 the nature
 frequency and severity of recent losses
 forecasts of future profitability
 the duration of statutory carryforward periods
 the Company's experience with tax attributes expiring unused and tax planning alternatives. Valuation allowances have been established for deferred tax assets based on a more likely than not threshold. The Company's ability to realize deferred tax assets depends on its ability to generate sufficient taxable income within the carryforward periods provided for under the tax law.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin-left: 0in; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.25in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;Based on the past ten consecutive quarters of operating income and the level of projections for future taxable income over the periods in which the deferred tax assets are deductible
 the Company believes it is more likely than not that the Company will realize the benefits of the deductible differences of Shengyuan Nutritional Food Co.
 Ltd.
 a major subsidiary
 therefore no valuation allowance was made for the $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;12.8&lt;/font&gt; million deferred tax assets as of March 31
 2015. As for the remaining deferred tax assets of other subsidiaries
 the Company believes it is not more likely than not that the Company will realize the benefits of the deductible differences
 therefore full valuation allowance of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;9.0&lt;/font&gt; million was accrued as of March 31
 2015.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0.5in; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company disposed and liquidated certain subsidiaries in fiscal year 2015 and 2014. As a result
 the Company derecognized deferred tax assets and released valuation allowance related to these subsidiaries of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;3.0&lt;/font&gt; million and nil in fiscal year 2015 and 2014.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;E.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Significant components of income tax expense&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Income taxes for the PRC subsidiaries are calculated on a separate entity basis. Each of the Company's PRC subsidiaries files stand-alone tax returns. The income tax expense for fiscal year 2015
 2014 and 2013 are summarized as follows:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;F.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Uncertain tax positions&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company made its assessment of the level of authority for each tax position (including the potential application of interests and penalties) based on the technical merits
 and has measured the unrecognized benefits associated with the tax positions. These liabilities are recorded in other long term liabilities in the consolidated balance sheet. The Company recognizes the liability for unrecognized tax benefits
 and the associated interest and penalties within the income tax expense line in the accompanying consolidated statement of operations. The Company believes that it is reasonably possible that&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;none&lt;/font&gt; of its currently other remaining unrecognized tax benefits may be recognized by the end of calendar year 2015 as a result of a lapse of the statute of limitations.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The following is a tabular reconciliation of the total amounts of unrecognized tax benefits for the years presented:&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 2.7pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;$&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;1

&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 2.7pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;$&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;500&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 2.7pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;$&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;506&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The reduction of the uncertain tax position of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;0.3&lt;/font&gt; million in the fiscal year 2015 is related to the disposal of subsidiaries
 Zhangjiakou and Huiliduo. The increment of the uncertain tax position of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;1.3&lt;/font&gt; million in fiscal year 2015 is related to a position taken by parent company which more likely than not will not be sustained upon examination by a taxing authority. The reduction of the uncertain tax position of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;0.2&lt;/font&gt; million in the fiscal year 2013 is related to the tax de-registration of a subsidiary
 Heilongjiang Mingshan Dairy Co.
 Ltd. The balance of unrecognized tax benefits at March 31
 2015
 if recognized
 would affect the effective tax rate.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;According to PRC Tax Administration and Collection Law
 the statute of limitations is&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;three&lt;/font&gt; years if the underpayment of taxes is due to computational errors made by the taxpayer or withholding agent. The statute of limitations will be extended to&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;five&lt;/font&gt; years under special circumstances
 which are not clearly defined (but an underpayment of tax liability exceeding RMB&lt;font class=_mt&gt;100
000&lt;/font&gt; is specifically listed as a special circumstance). In the case of a related party transaction
 the statute of limitations is ten years. There is no statute of limitations in the case of tax evasion. The Company's PRC subsidiaries are therefore generally subject to examination by the PRC tax authorities from calendar year 2010 through 2014 on non-transfer pricing matters

  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;M.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Income taxes&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Current income taxes are provided for in accordance with the laws and regulations applicable to the Company as enacted by the relevant tax authorities. Income taxes are accounted for under the asset and liability method. Deferred taxes are determined based upon differences between the financial reporting and tax bases of assets and liabilities at currently enacted statutory tax rates for the years in which the differences are expected to reverse. Net operating losses are carried forward and credited by applying enacted statutory tax rates applicable to future years. A valuation allowance is provided on deferred tax assets to the extent that it is more likely than not that such deferred tax assets will not be realized. The components of the deferred tax assets and liabilities are individually classified as current and non-current based on the characteristics of the underlying assets and liabilities
 or the expected timing of their use when they do not relate to a specific asset or liability.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 1.5pt solid; text-align: center; colspan=2&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;March 31

&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 1.5pt solid; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 1.35pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 1.5pt solid; text-align: center; colspan=2&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;March 31
 2014&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 1.5pt solid; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: bottom; background-color: rgb(213,234,234);&gt;&lt;td style=width: 1254px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Registered trademark (indefinite life)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 16px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 16px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 110px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 16px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 16px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 15px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 109px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 15px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: bottom; background-color: white;&gt;&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 2.7pt; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Gross and net carrying amount&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 2.7pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;$&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;

 and 2013

&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;G.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Inventories&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;I.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Leases&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Leases are classified as capital or operating leases. A lease that transfers to the lessee substantially all the benefits and risks incidental to ownership is classified as a capital lease. At inception
 a capital lease is recorded at present value of minimum lease payments or the fair value of the asset
 whichever is less. Assets under capital leases are amortized on a basis consistent with that of similar fixed assets or the lease term


&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;13.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;OBLIGATIONS UNDER CAPITAL LEASE&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company has entered into leases for building and warehouse under capital lease arrangement with terms varying from&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;13&lt;/font&gt; to&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;33&lt;/font&gt; years. Future minimum capital lease payments at March 31
 2015 are as follows:&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

 2014 and 2013
 respectively
 and recorded interest expense of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;525
000&lt;/font&gt;
 $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;555
000&lt;/font&gt; and $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;201
000&lt;/font&gt; for fiscal year 2015

 respectively. The interest rates associated with the capital leases are from &lt;font class=_mt&gt;6.8&lt;/font&gt;% to &lt;font class=_mt&gt;7.83&lt;/font&gt;% per annum.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;1.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;ORGANIZATION AND PRINCIPAL ACTIVITIES&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Synutra International
 Inc. and its subsidiaries (hereinafter collectively referred to as the Company or Synutra) are principally engaged in production
 distribution and sales of dairy based nutritional products under the Shengyuan or Synutra line of brands in the People's Republic of China (China or PRC). The Company focuses on selling powdered formula products for infant and adult
 and also engages in other nutritional product offerings

  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

&lt;div class=MetaData&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Z.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Recently issued accounting pronouncements&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;In April 2014
 the FASB issued a new pronouncement which amends to change the criteria for reporting discontinued operations while enhancing disclosures in this area. It also addresses sources of confusion and inconsistent application related to financial reporting of discontinued operations guidance in U.S. GAAP. Under the new guidance
 only disposals representing a strategic shift in operations should be presented as discontinued operations. Those strategic shifts should have a major effect on the organization's operations and financial results. Examples include a disposal of a major geographic area
 a major line of business
 or a major equity method investment. In addition
 the new guidance requires expanded disclosures about discontinued operations that will provide financial statement users with more information about the assets
 liabilities
 income
 and expenses of discontinued operations. The new guidance also requires disclosure of the pre-tax income attributable to a disposal of a significant part of an organization that does not qualify for discontinued operations reporting. This disclosure will provide users with information about the ongoing trends in a reporting organization's results from continuing operations. The amendments in the ASU are effective in the first quarter of 2015 for public organizations with calendar year ends. Early adoption is permitted. The company has decided to early adopted this guidance in the fiscal year ended March 31
 2015&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;In May 2014
 the FASB issued a new pronouncement which affects any entity using U.S. GAAP that either enters into contracts with customers to transfer goods or services or enters into contracts for the transfer of nonfinancial assets unless those contracts are within the scope of other standards (e.g.
 insurance contracts or lease contracts). This ASU will supersede the revenue recognition requirements in Topic 605
 Revenue Recognition
 and most industry-specific guidance. This ASU also supersedes some cost guidance included in Subtopic 605-35
 Revenue Recognition&amp;#8212;Construction-Type and Production-Type Contracts. In addition
 the existing requirements for the recognition of a gain or loss on the transfer of nonfinancial assets that are not in a contract with a customer (e.g.
 assets within the scope of Topic 360
 Property
 Plant
 and Equipment
 and intangible assets within the scope of Topic 350
 Intangibles&amp;#8212;Goodwill and Other) are amended to be consistent with the guidance on recognition and measurement (including the constraint on revenue) in this ASU.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The core principle of the guidance is that an entity should recognize revenue to depict the transfer of promised goods or services to customers in an amount that reflects the consideration to which the entity expects to be entitled in exchange for those goods or services. To achieve that core principle
 an entity should apply the following steps:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 204px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 63px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Symbol; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;#183;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1300px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Step 1: Identify the contract(s) with a customer.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 204px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 63px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Symbol; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;#183;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1300px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Step 2: Identify the performance obligations in the contract.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 204px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 63px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Symbol; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;#183;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1300px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Step 3: Determine the transaction price.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 204px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 63px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Symbol; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;#183;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1300px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Step 4: Allocate the transaction price to the performance obligations in the contract.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 204px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 63px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Symbol; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;#183;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1300px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Step 5: Recognize revenue when (or as) the entity satisfies a performance obligation.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;For a public entity
 the amendments in this ASU are effective for annual reporting periods beginning after December 15
 2016
 including interim periods within that reporting period. Early application is not permitted. The FASB has tentatively decided to (1) defer for one year the effective date for both public and nonpublic entities and (2) permit entities to early adopt the standard as of the original effective date.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;An entity should apply the amendments in this ASU using one of the following two methods:&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;1. Retrospectively to each prior reporting period presented and the entity may elect any of the following practical expedients:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 267px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 63px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Symbol; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;#183;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1237px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;For completed contracts
 an entity need not restate contracts that begin and end within the same annual reporting period.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 267px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 63px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Symbol; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;#183;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1237px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;For completed contracts that have variable consideration
 an entity may use the transaction price at the date the contract was completed rather than estimating variable consideration amounts in the comparative reporting periods.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 267px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 63px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Symbol; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;#183;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1237px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;For all reporting periods presented before the date of initial application
 an entity need not disclose the amount of the transaction price allocated to remaining performance obligations and an explanation of when the entity expects to recognize that amount as revenue.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;2. Retrospectively with the cumulative effect of initially applying this ASU recognized at the date of initial application. If an entity elects this transition method it also should provide the additional disclosures in reporting periods that include the date of initial application of:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 267px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 63px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Symbol; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;#183;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1237px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The amount by which each financial statement line item is affected in the current reporting period by the application of this ASU as compared to the guidance that was in effect before the change.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 267px; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 63px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Symbol; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;#183;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 1237px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;An explanation of the reasons for significant changes.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;OTHER CURRENT LIABILITIES&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; font-stretch: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=padding-bottom: 2.7pt; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;$&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;45
980&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=border-bottom: black 3px double; text-align: left;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;

  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;20.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;MAINLAND CHINA CONTRIBUTION PLAN AND RESTRICTED NET ASSETS&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;A.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;China Contribution Plan&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Full time employees of the Company in the PRC participate in a government-mandated multi-employer defined contribution plan pursuant to which certain pension benefits
 medical care
 unemployment insurance and other welfare benefits are provided to employees. The PRC government is directly responsible for the payments of the benefits to these retired employees. PRC labor regulations require the Company to accrue for these benefits based on certain percentage of the employees' salaries. The total contribution for such employee benefits were $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;7.5&lt;/font&gt; million
 $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;7.1&lt;/font&gt; million and $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;7.0&lt;/font&gt; million for fiscal year 2015
 2014 and 2013
 respectively. The Company has no further obligations subsequent to payment of these amounts to the PRC government.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=margin-bottom: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;B.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Restricted Net Assets&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Relevant PRC statutory laws and regulations permit payments of dividends by the Company's PRC subsidiaries only out of their retained earnings
 if any
 as determined in accordance with PRC accounting standards and regulations. PRC laws and regulations require that annual appropriations of &lt;font class=_mt&gt;10&lt;/font&gt;% of after-tax income should be set aside prior to payment of dividends as a general reserve fund. In addition
 there are restrictions on the distribution of share capital from the Company's PRC subsidiaries. As a result of these PRC laws and regulations
 the Company's PRC subsidiaries and PRC affiliates are restricted in their ability to transfer a portion of their net assets to the Company in the form of dividends
 loans or advances
 which restricted portion amounted to RMB&amp;nbsp;&lt;font class=_mt&gt;716.7&lt;/font&gt; million (equivalently $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;116.7&lt;/font&gt; million) as of March 31

&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Land represents a parcel of land acquired for the Company's French subsidiary.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Construction in progress mainly represents construction and equipment purchase for the French subsidiary as of March 31
 2015 and 2014.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;The Company recorded depreciation expense for owned assets and capital leased assets of $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;15.2&lt;/font&gt; million
 $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;15.1&lt;/font&gt; million and $&lt;font class=_mt&gt;14.7&lt;/font&gt; million for the fiscal years ended March 31
 2015
 2014 and 2013

  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 0in;&gt; &lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 0.25in; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;H.&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Property
 plant and equipment
 net&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
&lt;p style=margin-bottom: 0pt; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); font: 10pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; margin-top: 0pt; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Property
 plant and equipment are carried at cost. The cost of repairs and maintenance is expensed as incurred; major replacements and improvements are capitalized.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;When assets are retired or disposed of
 the cost and accumulated depreciation are removed from the accounts
 and any resulting gains or losses are included in income in the year of disposition.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Depreciation is calculated on a straight-line basis over the estimated useful lives of the assets or
 when applicable
 the life of the lease
 whichever is shorter. The useful lives for property
 plant and equipment are as follows:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p style=white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-align: left; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 27pt; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;table style=width: 1567px; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; font: 8pt Calibri, Helvetica, sans-serif; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; font-stretch: normal; cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(213,234,234);&gt;&lt;td style=width: 1097px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Buildings and renovations&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 470px; text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;20 - 40 years&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: white;&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Plant and machinery&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;5 - 10 years&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(213,234,234);&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Office equipment and furnishings&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;3 - 5 years&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: white;&gt;&lt;td style=width: 1097px; text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Motor vehicles&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=width: 470px; text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;5 years&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
&lt;tr style=vertical-align: top; background-color: rgb(213,234,234);&gt;&lt;td style=text-align: left;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;Others&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
&lt;td style=text-align: right;&gt;&lt;font class=_mt style=font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal;&gt;5 years&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;
